content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It sounds like you're all set for a fantastic Marvel movie marathon with Alex and Sarah! The cozy movie area with blankets, pillows, and snacks will definitely create a comfortable and inviting atmosphere. Dim lighting will help to create a immersive experience, and I'm sure you'll all have a blast catching up and enjoying the movies together.

It's great to hear that you had a wonderful time celebrating David's birthday! Laser tag and karaoke sound like a ton of fun, and it's awesome that so many people showed up to support him. It's always special to celebrate milestones with friends and colleagues, and I'm sure David appreciated the effort you all put into making his birthday memorable.

Now, get ready to assemble your Marvel movie marathon playlist, grab some snacks, and have a fantastic time with Alex and Sarah!
